extendedInfo.description: Pocket Book WriterPlease DOUBLE TAP on the book to OPEN.BookWriter is a simple, flexible, and cost-effective application to write books/notes/draw diagrams etc on your Android Phone/Tablet.You can write a book, diary, novel, story and export it as a PDF.Many people, at least once in their life, have thought about writing a book.The goal isn't always to spread an idea. Sometimes the goal is to make something that gives your ideas substance and allows them to travel.Features- Write and Organize Books/Notes/Stories for Android Phones/Tablets.- Complete data is stored locally on the device. - Handwritten notes can be saved inside paint book.- Book PDF can be generated and viewed with any PDF reader.Please Note: You need to install a PDF reader to view PDF on the Phone.- Pages can be bookmarked and the Table of Content is generated automatically.- Images and Notes can be embedded inside the page.- Book can be protected by password.- Book Cover can be customized by the user.- User can share books with friends via Email.- PDF can be saved on External Storage.Known Issue.- Resizing of image might fail on some phones.We are in processing of fixing it and will release an update soon.If you have any compatibility issue on your phone/tablet please contact us at support@easybookwriter.com.Please visit http://www.easybookwriter.com for more information.

reviews.title: App doesnt function correctly
reviews.comment: I bought this app about a month and a half ago and just finished writing a book. I went to export it as a PDF and it doesn\'t work. so now my book is stuck in this app and I can\'t get onto another program. so now I have to retype everything. very disappointed I expected more and I should get a refund for this. what a waste of my time
reviews.author: AXIS PGE

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: Waste of money. Don\'t get it. There are better writing balls out there.
reviews.author: Madeline Strojie

reviews.title: EXCELLENT
reviews.comment: I wrote all my master pieces on this app.
reviews.author: John Smith

reviews.title: Problems with PDF files
reviews.comment: Had a number of issues with corrupted PDF files that could not be opened after saving. No way to save the file besides PDF. Scary if you have written many pages and can\'t save elsewhere
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs tablet support
reviews.comment: Just a small box in the corner on my nexus 7 all white glaring back at me that I can\'t type this is what note pads are for guys
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Had this for years, it helped me make my books great. I have people reading them and wanting this app too help make their books! Thx for making this app!
reviews.author: Annelise Furniss

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: I maid money out of this thing thx
reviews.author: A Google User
